long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NNS chrome extension allows to resolve NNS names on specific dApps and websites which still don’t natively support the NNS registry.

The goal of the Nouns Name Service is to be natively resolved everywhere.
However, being natively resolved on the biggest platforms we use everyday could take time.

This extension has been developed to fill this gap, allowing you to use your NNS in the most important apps and websites as soon as you install it.

This way, you will be able to see your .⌐◨-◨ and interact with it on the platforms you use everyday, while we continue to build our network.

Websites and dApps currently supported:

- Etherscan.io

We will constantly add new features to this extension, studied to enhance your NNS experience.

If you have any feedback or feature request, feel free to reach out @nnsprotocol on Twitter or on the NNS Discord!
